article_title: Why America's small businesses aren't cheering same-sex marriage
article_text:

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

twitter.title: Why America’s small businesses aren’t cheering same-sex marriage

article_metadata.keywords: same-sex marriage, u.s. supreme court, coca-cola, tide, kellogg company, american airlines, hobby lobby
article_metadata.description: While many across corporate America cheered the U.S. Supreme Court's landmark ruling supporting same-sex marriage, small businesses have legal room to interpret the law a different way.
